about_the_game:
That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Perverted Hand is an exciting roguelite game that blends fast-paced action with hilarious, unpredictable fun! Each run is a fresh experience, face unexpected challenges, and develop your own unique Hand.

Easy to play, just harass and slap to win! The game’s core mechanics are simple but deeply satisfying. You control a Perverted Hand with an arsenal of slap-based attacks and tricks. Harass your enemies, toy with them, and strike at the perfect moment to claim victory!

Cute, sexy monsters populate every corner of the stage, adding a mix of humor to your adventures. Whether you're taking on sassy succubi, naughty slime, or other whimsical foes, each monster is uniquely designed to challenge and entertain. These flirty and fun characters will keep you on your toes as you strategize your next move!

The game features a robust 7 primary stats system that lets you build your hand’s power in many direction. From Strength to Luck, each stat plays a vital role in shaping how you handle different enemies and bosses.

Many skills with different usage, the hand’s potential is limitless. Upgrade a variety of abilities, from flashy attacks to clever evasions, and mix and match them to suit your strategy. Whether you’re focusing on brutal damage or tactical control, the flexibility in skill combinations ensures that every playthrough is fantastic.

Many items support rich gameplay, offering countless ways to enhance your hand’s abilities. Collect powerful artifacts that unlock new synergies and alter your combat tactics. These items aren’t just for show—they can drastically change how you approach each fight, giving you an edge against the game’s toughest challenges.

More than 10 hot scenes with horny bosses are waiting for you to conquer.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has adult themes, language, and fictional characters depicted in sexual situations. All characters depicted are over the age of 18. The game features nude characters in sexual acts, non-consensual sex, and BDSM.

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Perverted Hand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / AMD HD 7970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Take control of the weirdest hero: a sentient hand! Slap bizarre foes, summon quirky allies, or heal endlessly in this chaotic roguelite. Upgrade your hand with unique powers and enjoy extremely hot moments with beautiful girls as you conquer every unpredictable victory!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
